register_page.heading: Create an account
register_page.name: Full name
register_page.name_rule: Only letters and the dot (.) character, followed by a space, are allowed.
register_page.password_rule_1: Password must be at least 6 characters.
register_page.password_rule_2: Password must have at least one special character.
register_page.terms_rule: You must accept the terms and conditions.
register_page.email_desc: Email must be a valid email address.
register_page.password_desc: Password must be at least 6 characters and must have at least one special character.
